ygData.subject: Bottom half of song (minor spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I am finsihing up the easy part of the Bard Epic, and ran into a problem.  I went to find the guy in W Karana who turns into a Doppelganger (Miraz or
ygData.messageBody:
I am finsihing up the easy part of the Bard Epic, and ran into a problem. I went to find the guy in W Karana who turns into a Doppelganger (Miraz or something). I found his little band of merry men, and as I approached, they agroed on me.

Do I have to charm him to give him the note?

DO I have to kill off all his lackey's first?

In any case, do oyu think a group (6) of 50-54 will have any problem taking them out?

Elfson Allegro 51(doh, raided again last night so still haven't pushed out that last smidge to 52) Veeshan

PS. I don't know whY i am bothering to do this since I don't think I will ever be able to finish the quest since I depend on other guilds to take me on dragon raids, thus I will never get the components... Guess I can say I am half done my Epic Quest :-)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
